name: SpriteSheet Packer
tagline: Create you sprite atlas with GUI or command line tools.
body:
# Overview
SpriteSheet Packer is a GUI and command line tool to create sprite sheets.

Supported operating systems: MacOS, Windows and other [QT supported platform](http://doc.qt.io/qt-5/supported-platforms.html).

# Licensing
SpriteSheet Packer is MIT license, open source project intended to help the beginning developers.
Uses QT with LGPL license.

# Installation
Download pre-build [release](https://github.com/amakaseev/sprite-sheet-packer/releases) version.

Follow this steps for compile from sources:
* Download and install [QT with Qt Creater](http://www.qt.io/ru/download-open-source/)
* Clone sources from https://github.com/amakaseev/sprite-sheet-packer
* Open sprite-sheet-packer.pro, compile and run SpritePacker for GUI or SpritePackerCLI for command line.

# Usage Command line version
